EmailTemplate.name: Lead Application Request Email_Startup
EmailTemplate.subject: ProService Request for Proposal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Aloha,
Thank you for your interest in ProService. To prepare your customized proposal, please complete our online application. Please allow approximately 15 minutes for this process.
[URL to the Application Record for the Opportunity]
We recommend you begin by creating an account. You will be able to save your entry and complete the application at a later time if needed.
If you have any questions about this application, please contact your Business Development Manager: {!Opportunity.00N34000005kti0}, at {!if(Opportunity.00N34000005kthz='',"",Opportunity.00N34000005kthz&" or ")} {!Opportunity.00N34000005kthy}.
If you experience any issues with the online application, email our Sales Operations Department at salesoperations@proservice.com.
We look forward to partnering with you and your business.
Mahalo,
ProService Hawaii
Address: 6600 Kalanianaole Highway Suite 200 Honolulu, HI 96825 Website: http://www.proservice.com/ Phone: 808-394-8878
